question.title: Will Canada hold a national referendum on energy independence before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Canada holds a national referendum on energy independence between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The referendum must be officially recognized by the Canadian government and reported by reputable news sources.

not_P.title: Will Canada not hold a national referendum on energy independence before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Canada does not hold a national referendum on energy independence between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The referendum must not be officially recognized by the Canadian government and reported by reputable news sources.

para_P.title: Is a national referendum regarding energy independence expected to take place in Canada prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if a national referendum concerning energy independence is conducted in Canada from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The referendum must receive official acknowledgment from the Canadian government and be covered by credible news organizations.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The United States officially implements a nationwide ban on single-use plastic bags before January 1, 2028, AND (b) Canada does not hold a national referendum on energy independence before January 1, 2028?
question.body: (a) This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the United States government officially implements a nationwide ban on single-use plastic bags between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028. The ban must be enacted through federal legislation or executive order and come into effect within this timeframe. (b) This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Canada does not hold a national referendum on energy independence between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, or if the referendum is not officially recognized by the Canadian government or not reported by reputable news sources.

not_P.title: Will either of the following not occur: (a) The United States officially implements a nationwide ban on single-use plastic bags before January 1, 2028, OR (b) Canada holds a national referendum on energy independence before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: (a) This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the United States government does not officially implement a nationwide ban on single-use plastic bags between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028. The ban must not be enacted through federal legislation or executive order and must not come into effect within this timeframe. (b) This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Canada holds a national referendum on energy independence between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, or if the referendum is officially recognized by the Canadian government and reported by reputable news sources.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) The United States will formally establish a countrywide prohibition on single-use plastic bags prior to January 1, 2028, AND (b) Canada will refrain from conducting a national referendum regarding energy independence before January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: (a) This inquiry will be answered 'Yes' if the U.S. government enacts a nationwide restriction on single-use plastic bags at some point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. (b) This inquiry will be answered 'Yes' if Canada does not conduct a national referendum on energy independence from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, or if the referendum is not officially acknowledged by the Canadian government or not covered by credible news outlets.

(b) There must be no operational biotechnology facility that uses nuclear energy at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. This means the facility should neither be officially launched nor operational, nor should there be confirmation from both the company running it and a trustworthy news outlet.

question.title: Will France reduce its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels by January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if France reduces its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. question.title: Will both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) Russia officially withdraws from the Paris Agreement and (b) France fails to reduce its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028, with confirmation by official UNFCCC documentation; and (b) France does not reduce its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the data reported by a reputable source such as the French Ministry for the Ecological Transition or the European Environment Agency (EEA).

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) Russia officially withdraws from the Paris Agreement nor (b) France reduces its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if neither of the following conditions are met: (a) Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028, with confirmation by official UNFCCC documentation; and (b) France reduces its greenhouse gas emissions by at least 35% from 2005 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the data reported by a reputable source such as the French Ministry for the Ecological Transition or the European Environment Agency (EEA).

para_P.title: By January 1, 2028, will the following two events take place: (a) Russia formally exits the Paris Agreement and (b) France does not achieve a reduction of at least 35% in its greenhouse gas emissions compared to 2005 levels?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if both of the subsequent criteria are satisfied: (a) Russia officially communicates its decision to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) regarding its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal procedure prior to January 1, 2028, as confirmed by official documentation from the UNFCCC; and (b) France fails to lower its greenhouse gas emissions by a minimum of 35% from 2005 figures at any time between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the information verified by a credible source such as the French Ministry for the Ecological Transition or the European Environment Agency (EEA).

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following events will take place prior to January 1, 2028: (a) A private enterprise successfully sends a spacecraft into orbit using solely renewable energy, or (b) Elon Musk returns to host or co-host Saturday Night Live (SNL)?

question.title: Will Amazon establish a regional headquarters in Canada before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Amazon officially announces and opens a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between the creation date of October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must be fully operational and recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

question.title: Will Italy's GDP growth rate exceed 5% in any year between 2025 and 2027, as reported by the International Monetary Fund?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Italy's gross domestic product (GDP) growth rate exceeds 5% in any calendar year from 2025 to 2027, based on data reported by the International Monetary Fund (IMF). The growth rate must be derived from the IMF's official annual GDP growth statistics.

not_P.title: Will Italy's GDP growth rate not exceed 5% in any year between 2025 and 2027, as reported by the International Monetary Fund?

para_P.title: Is there any year from 2025 to 2027 when Italy's GDP growth rate will surpass 5%, according to the International Monetary Fund?

The growth rate must be based on the IMF's official annual GDP growth figures.

question.title: Will an AI-driven drug discovery platform developed in Mexico receive FDA approval before January 1, 2028?

The measurement must be based on official data released by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another reputable national or international organization.

not_P.title: Will South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions not decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions do not decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The measurement must be based on official data released by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another reputable national or international organization.

para_P.title: Is it possible for South Korea to achieve a reduction of at least 20% in greenhouse gas emissions from the levels recorded in 2020 prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if there is a reduction of at least 20% in South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions from the 2020 levels at any time between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The assessment must rely on official statistics published by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another credible national or international body.

question.title: Will both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (1) A publicly traded biotechnology company based in the United States achieves a market capitalization of at least $200 billion, and (2) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions do not decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (1) A publicly traded biotechnology company based in the United States achieves a market capitalization of at least $200 billion between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, verified by a reputable financial data provider such as Bloomberg or Reuters. (2) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions do not decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, based on official data released by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another reputable national or international organization.

not_P.title: Will not both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (1) A publicly traded biotechnology company based in the United States does not achieve a market capitalization of at least $200 billion, or (2) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if at least one of the following conditions is met: (1) A publicly traded biotechnology company based in the United States does not achieve a market capitalization of at least $200 billion between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, verified by a reputable financial data provider such as Bloomberg or Reuters. (2) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, based on official data released by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another reputable national or international organization.

para_P.title: By January 1, 2028, will the following two events take place: (1) A biotechnology firm that is publicly traded in the United States reaches a market valuation of no less than $200 billion, and (2) South Korea's emissions of greenhouse gases fail to drop by at least 20% compared to 2020 figures?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with 'Yes' if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) A biotechnology firm that is publicly traded in the United States attains a market valuation of at least $200 billion between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, as confirmed by a reliable financial data source such as Bloomberg or Reuters. (2) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions do not decline by a minimum of 20% from 2020 levels at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, according to official statistics published by South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another credible national or international entity.

not_P.title: Will neither South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions decrease by at least 20% from 2020 levels before January 1, 2028, nor a US-based biotechnology company achieve a market cap of $200 billion by January 1, 2028?

para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered 'Yes' if at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) South Korea's greenhouse gas emissions fall by a minimum of 20% from 2020 levels at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, according to official statistics from South Korea's Ministry of Environment or another credible entity. (b) A publicly listed biotechnology company in the United States attains a market capitalization of no less than $200 billion between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, as confirmed by a trustworthy financial data source like Bloomberg or Reuters.

question.title: Will Amazon establish a regional headquarters in Canada before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Amazon officially announces and opens a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between the creation date of October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must be fully operational and recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

not_P.title: Will Amazon not establish a regional headquarters in Canada before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Amazon does not officially announce and open a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between the creation date of October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must not be fully operational and recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

para_P.title: Is Amazon going to set up a regional office in Canada prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed 'Yes' if Amazon makes an official declaration and launches a regional office in any Canadian city between the date of October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The office must be completely functional and acknowledged as a regional headquarters by Amazon's corporate hierarchy.

question.title: Will both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) NATO adopts an AI strategy for cybersecurity, and (b) Amazon does not establish a regional headquarters in Canada?
question.body: (a) NATO must adopt an official AI strategy specifically for cybersecurity between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. This adoption must be documented in NATO's official publications and reported by a reputable news source. (b) Amazon must not officially announce and open a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must not be fully operational or recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) NATO does not adopt an AI strategy for cybersecurity, or (b) Amazon establishes a regional headquarters in Canada?
not_P.body: (a) NATO must not adopt an official AI strategy specifically for cybersecurity between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. This means there will be no documentation in NATO's official publications and no reporting by a reputable news source regarding such an adoption. (b) Amazon must officially announce and open a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must be fully operational and recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

para_P.title: Is it true that by January 1, 2028, both the following will take place: (a) NATO implements a strategy for AI in cybersecurity, and (b) Amazon refrains from launching a regional office in Canada?
para_P.body: (a) NATO is required to officially implement a strategy for AI that focuses on cybersecurity from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. This implementation must be recorded in NATO's official documents and reported by a credible news outlet. (b) Amazon must not make an official announcement or open a regional office in any Canadian city during the period from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The office in question must not be fully functional or acknowledged as a regional headquarters by Amazon's corporate structure.

question.title: Will either of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) Amazon establish a regional headquarters in Canada, or (b) NATO adopt an AI strategy for cybersecurity?
question.body:
(a) Amazon establishes a regional headquarters in Canada: This will be resolved as 'Yes' if Amazon officially announces and opens a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. (b) NATO adopts an AI strategy for cybersecurity: This will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, NATO adopts an official AI strategy specifically for cybersecurity. not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) Amazon not establish a regional headquarters in Canada, nor (b) NATO not adopt an AI strategy for cybersecurity?
not_P.body:
(a) Amazon does not establish a regional headquarters in Canada: This will be resolved as 'Yes' if Amazon does not officially announce and open a regional headquarters in any city within Canada between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must not be fully operational and recognized as a regional office by Amazon's corporate structure.

(b) NATO does not adopt an AI strategy for cybersecurity: This will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, NATO does not adopt an official AI strategy specifically for cybersecurity. para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, either (a) Amazon will set up a regional headquarters in Canada, or (b) NATO will implement an AI strategy focused on cybersecurity?
para_P.body:
(a) Amazon setting up a regional headquarters in Canada: This will be marked as 'Yes' if Amazon makes an official announcement and launches a regional headquarters in any Canadian city between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The headquarters must be fully operational and acknowledged as a regional office within Amazon's corporate framework.

(b) NATO implementing an AI strategy for cybersecurity: This will be marked as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, NATO officially adopts a specific AI strategy for cybersecurity. This adoption must be recorded in NATO's official documents and reported by a credible news outlet.

question.title: Will an Australian space agency launch a mission beyond Earth's orbit before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if an Australian space agency (such as the Australian Space Agency) successfully launches a mission that travels beyond Earth's orbit between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. not_P.title: Will an Australian space agency not launch a mission beyond Earth's orbit before January 1, 2028?

para_P.title: Is it possible for an Australian space agency to initiate a mission that goes beyond Earth's orbit prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if an Australian space agency (for instance, the Australian Space Agency) successfully executes a mission that ventures beyond Earth's orbit within the timeframe of October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) China and the United States sign a bilateral climate agreement, and (b) no Australian space agency launches a mission beyond Earth's orbit?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (a) China and the United States sign a bilateral agreement specifically addressing climate change, which must be officially recognized by both governments and published in their respective official records; and (b) no Australian space agency (such as the Australian Space Agency) successfully launches a mission that travels beyond Earth's orbit, confirmed by the lack of official announcements from the Australian space agency and no independent verification from reputable space organizations.

question.title: Will the market size of the robotics industry exceed $100 billion by January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the global market size of the robotics industry, as reported by a reputable market research firm such as Statista, MarketsandMarkets, or Grand View Research, exceeds $100 billion at any point between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following takes place prior to January 1, 2028: (a) The global robotics industry market value surpasses $100 billion, or (b) An individual with a professional background in sports management or similar fields is appointed to a national legislative position in a NATO member nation?

question.title: Will the US Congress hold a formal hearing on the implications of dark matter research before January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will both of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (1) the percentage of Americans who believe in climate change denial falls below 10% and (2) the US Congress does not hold a formal hearing on the implications of dark matter research?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met before January 1, 2028: (1) The percentage of Americans who believe in climate change denial falls below 10%, based on reputable public opinion polls conducted by organizations such as Gallup, Pew Research Center, or similar institutions, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028.
